title: Where is this animation for Spirit Guard Udyr?
body:
The model viewer on LoLKing has an animation for Spirit Guard Udyr where he's taking a runner stance that's labeled as "brush_idle".
Why isn't this model in the game at all? Why was it removed from an Ultimate Skin, which is supposed to be the best Riot can produced?
~~Obligatory, why wasn't this skin just his visual update?~~

replies.body:
Hey RBrim08,

This appears to be a temp animation that didn't make it to the final released version of Spirit Guard Udyr on live. This temp animation may have been picked up during an early PBE cycle, which is why it's showing up on LoLKing. It's intended that this animation is not being called for Spirit Guard Udyr.
Caiptain Obvious here: It is probably, as the name says, a idle animation in the brush. Maybe it starts when you stay a while in a brush and do nothing?

I've stayed standing in the brush while as Udyr, his idle stance doesn't change.
The pose and the name makes it more seem like a "hiding in wait" animation, like what Kha'zix has when stealthed.
Have you tried it specifically while in bear stance? Because the model viewer doesn't seem to have that animation attached to any other stance.
if it was his visual update noone would have to  pay 20$ to Riot so 0 money
